description: A weeklong study in July found that more than 64% of motorists were breaking the 30mph speed limit.
title: Speed 'buffer zone' to be introduced in St Marks
title_page: Speed 'buffer zone' to be introduced in St Marks - BBC News
maintext: Most of the A26, which passes through St Marks, is derestricted and the gradual decrease in the speed limit would encourage motorists to slow down on the approach, said a government spokesman.
